title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Development and Application of an Educational Feedback Awareness Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize an educational feedback scale consisting of three dimensions (mastery, positive emotions, negative emotions) with over 85% reliability
Learners can validate feedback scales by applying mixed research methods (exploratory and confirmatory factor analysis)
Learners can analyze educational feedback using a 19-item scale in project-based learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
